languages.text: "Ты причинил столько бед моему протекторату, что единственным стоящим наказанием будет вытащить тебя из Комморры живьем, чтобы ты мог расплатиться со мной по долгам".
"You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."
languages.original_text: "Ты причинил столько бед моему протекторату, что единственным стоящим наказанием будет вытащить тебя из Комморры живьем, чтобы ты мог расплатиться со мной по долгам".

traits.locale_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."
"You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."
"You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."
"You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

languages.text: “你给我的王朝惹了这么多麻烦，唯一适合你的惩罚，就是把你活着带出科摩罗。只有这样，你才能偿还你欠我的债务。”
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: “你给我的王朝惹了这么多麻烦，唯一适合你的惩罚，就是把你活着带出科摩罗。只有这样，你才能偿还你欠我的债务。”

languages.text: « Vous avez causé tant d'ennuis à mon protectorat que le seul châtiment que je juge approprié serait de vous traîner hors de Commorragh vivant pour vous forcer à rembourser votre dette. »
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez causé tant d'ennuis à mon protectorat que le seul châtiment que je juge approprié serait de vous traîner hors de Commorragh vivant pour vous forcer à rembourser votre dette. »

languages.text: «Has causado tantos problemas a mi protectorado que el único castigo adecuado es sacarte vivo de Commorragh para que saldes tu deuda conmigo».
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: «Has causado tantos problemas a mi protectorado que el único castigo adecuado es sacarte vivo de Commorragh para que saldes tu deuda conmigo».

languages.text: 「お前は{mf|俺|私}の保護領に多大な迷惑をかけた。お前にふさわしい唯一の罰は、コモラフから生きたまま引きずり出し、その借りを返させることだ」
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は{mf|俺|私}の保護領に多大な迷惑をかけた。お前にふさわしい唯一の罰は、コモラフから生きたまま引きずり出し、その借りを返させることだ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt meinem Protektorat so viel Ärger gemacht, dass es für Euch nur eine angemessene Strafe gibt: Euch lebendig aus Commorragh zu schleifen, damit Ihr Eure Schuld mir gegenüber begleichen könnt."
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt meinem Protektorat so viel Ärger gemacht, dass es für Euch nur eine angemessene Strafe gibt: Euch lebendig aus Commorragh zu schleifen, damit Ihr Eure Schuld mir gegenüber begleichen könnt."

languages.text: "Protektoramda çok sıkıntı yarattın. Bana olan borcunu öde diye seni Commorragh'tan yaka paça çıkarmaktan daha güzel bir ceza olamaz."
languages.original_text: "You have caused so much trouble for my protectorate that the only fitting punishment is to drag you out of Commorragh alive so that you may pay your debt to me."

traits.locale_text: "Protektoramda o kadar sıkıntı yarattın ki, bana olan borcunu öde diye seni yaka paça Commorragh'tan çıkarmaktan daha uygun bir ceza olamaz."
